name: Machine Armor Zero
description:
Machine Armor Zero

is an isometric mech action survival game with fast paced gameplay and roguelite elements.
Command a powerful mech across a diverse battleground.
Choose from four distinctive classes, countless permanent upgrades, and tons of unique upgrades and weapons.
Your journey centers on adapting your mech with a variety of upgrades tailored to your style. Master new abilities and unlock new styles of gameplay

Features Include:
  • Customizable Mechs
  • 4 Mech Classes
  • Unlockable Mech Parts
  • RPG stat system to create endless unique fun builds and replayability
  • An array of fun and unique weapons with ultimate evolutions and global bonuses that synergize to create tons of gameplay variety.
